name: Knight of Metal Realm
description:
The knight of metal realm must complete all missions that his commander gives him and this time a rogue army with heavy war tanks has struck the superhero city, how will the iron robot hero rescue his people in this crime city? The metal knight must use his grand action and spell beams like power shots to destroy the army commander.

OXO Games Studio brings another unique superhero game with an excellent original story and full grand action packed game featuring rogue army with metal war tanks and an evil plan to destroy the crime city. How will the iron robot knight use his spell power to stop this evil? Play now to find out more about this action packed dynamic story.

FEATURES:
• A unique original iron knight story
• Heart-throbbing hero missions
• Explosive and engaging crime city gameplay
• Different destructive weapons to use
• Smooth and easy controls
• Full action game with rogue army agents and tanks
• Astonishing HD Graphics
• Free to play forever
• Action music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
